comments.body: Great idea
Do you mean a skin pack/ resource pack  by LEGO brand building systems?
It is actually a lego set that includes the bee-mob.
They would be pretty cute. I think they would make it in the "sleeping" pose, that seems to be the most marketable. I would love a plush like that!

I'm not saying "I don't like the character creator and don't want to use it."

I'm saying "the character creator is harmful to the established skin system and it should not be added to the game."
It's an optional thing. You don't have touse it. Wanna ruin fun for everyone just because you don't like something optional?

I think the main reason why it was added to bedrock in the first place is because some platforms dont have the option to use custom skins, and so have absolutely no way to use them. I personally would have preferred a workaround to implement the existing skin system onto other platforms, but this is a decent way of doing it.

Also, I dont think theyre planning on it being added to java anyways, since it involves the dreaded microtransactions and would be redundant with all java platforms having a skin system.
how about a skin creator instead (something simliar to skincraft)
I disagree. It should be added to java edition.
man but it sucks to create a skin on editor and then upload it, it's tiring and I'm lazy and the hair for example can't even be volumous!
Maybe in a post-credit scene.

Another great feature that could be added with this whole partnership with google could be the saving of our pocket edition worlds to the google cloud so that if we get a new phone, we can just download the world file and then we have our worlds back
Accessibility Testing

I agree also since the current architecture listed in the Microsoft Store is "ARM" which is disingenuous since that means 32-bit ARM which has been deprecated (nothing supports this anymore on Windows). 

Installing from the Microsoft Store instead installs the x64 version, which runs poorly in emulation. We need a full working ARM64 version, which I know can be done since there was already a 32-bit version.
I think they actually did that on console with the editions button on the title screen. It does take you back to a older style of minecraft.
Yes the best thing about legacy edition had the best tutorial worlds my fav was the Xbox 360
adding Minecraft console edition to the launcher would be amazing

Please

mojang
I think it's on Netflix, maybe? I don't know.

i think minecraft should because i started 

a year ago so i never got to experienced it.
Even if the choices will not appear at the end of the episodes I would love to see it back on the store and playable.
To be honest, they should. Im pretty sure they have some rights to the game since it's about Minecraft and they were assosiated to make the game.
To answer the question in the second comment: It was, but Netflix removed it on Dec. 5th, 2022. It's truly a crushing defeat for the Story Mode fans.
If not the old version maybe a remake that has the updated minecraft appearance
Suggest anything you like! I might just include it into the suggestion ;)
Love this if added I hate the idea got rejected by mojang
Absolutely, parity definitely needs some work lately.

Sorry that happened to you. I suggest visiting the link below to get more info on why you were banned.

https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new 

If you were banned for the wrong reason, that might help.
EMRELS
yes emeralds will be the new cobblestone

That would be wonderful and I'd love to see a desert and savanna mini update before the cave update.
ok
Nobody is going to have a heart attack while playing Minecraft. And if they were to, it’d be from a creeper, not a guardian.

I heavily agree as someone who is not fond of instantly escalating jumpscares. Similar to the cave sounds there should be an option to disable the Elder Guardian Effect, the sounds don't scare me as much as the sudden and unpredictable animation. Now I am too nervous to play in the Minecraft server I just left because welp I got jumpscared and now I have a phobia

I disagree, and anyway, I believe that it is more of an asset. Cave noises as well. They both help you locate valuable materials. The Elder Guardian helps you find prismarine, Gold, and sea lanterns, and the cave noises help you find ores like Diamond. Anyway, you can lower your particle rendering and mute music, and I believe that both will disappear.

I don't think someone would be that scared to see a pufferfish slowly come down on their screen. Having the option to turn that on and off though is a something that could be added. Similar to the nausea effect, when the effect is applied a white effect can appear our the players screen for option two.
Uhh not really a jump scare...I mean it’s not scary at all. And a jumpscare is like FNAF That can be scary...
yes mojan pls remove this i am sometimes epileptic to jumpscares so uhhhhh

1. I agree I do not want anybody being scared 
  2.
YESSSS I would love it very much if the movie had a focus on Steve and Alex as part of the main cast of characters or at least get a nod establishing them as important at the end like what you said.
Should it be live-action?
Because realistic mobs would be ugly.
This is a great idea but this would probably be very hard to make...
You can just edit minecraft source code
editing the code is quite tough, and if you don't have a pc, impossible
Why should this be its own edition? It would make infinitely more sense to just be an update, though even if it were to be an update it would likely be in the far, far future.
ok but whats the point?
you should also get it for free or 2 dollars if you purchased windows 10
ummmmm i think that it is stupid what about people who purchased java from minecraft.net huh???
Reason is ther are certain things in java that arent in bedrock
Do severs to bedrock
I like the idea but there's no incentive to making this. It would only be valuable to collectors or kids that happen to have these ancient devices buried in their backyard or something.

Maybe there could be a texture pack instead? Like instead of hearts it says HP?

Just an idea...…
Minecraft RPG
There is no called Google Play Pass
Agreed. Alot of Telltale games are on Steam already, so its beyond annoying that Minecraft Story Mode isn't. Please sort out your differences and get it back, Mojang and Telltale!

Clarified subject to help search results.

Thanks for your contribution.

This kind of thing has never been done before (as best as I know) and probably will never be done. Old generation should be left alone.....

Instead, perhaps you can think of it as a project you can do yourself! Install a conduit so you can breathe underwater, collect a bunch of kelp from a newly generated ocean, and start planting it; you can use bonemeal to spawn in seagrass, too. It will probably take a while but it should look pretty good afterwards!

@MacchuPicchu96 The project would be considerably huge... I'd rather take it as a last resort. I think perhaps the reason why Mojang has never done this kind of thing before is that after re-generating a whole chunk, the consistency of the terrain is difficult to preserve. But this time we won't have these problems; it should be relatively much easier!
Hao Hao Fu remember, kelp grows from 1 block!

This doesn't really need to be done for Java, as there are already world editors that can do it for you. However, there is no world editor for Bedrock, and the same problem persists. You can selectively choose to regenerate chunks around your build with MCedit.

If anything, there should be a way to regenerate those chunks in bedrock edition.

 

@MacchuPicchu96

Old generation should be left alone is your opinion. Mine is that we should have more control over worlds because it gets frustrating having to switch worlds or move everything very far whenever a new update comes out.
